definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
It takes ten years to nurture a tree, but a hundred years to train a man (idiom). A good education program takes a long time to develop.
pinyin: shi2 nian2 shu4 mu4 , bai3 nian2 shu4 ren2

definition: unable to see the wood for the trees/fig. only able to see isolated details, and not the bigger picture
pinyin: zhi3 jian4 shu4 mu4 bu4 jian4 sen1 lin2

sentences.english: And they protect against soil erosion by holding moisture in the ground.
sentences.chinese: 树木还能保持水分防止土壤侵蚀。

sentences.english: There are flowers between the trees along the road .
sentences.chinese: 沿路两旁的树木之间都种着花草。

sentences.english: There’re blue sky，beautiful trees and big buildings ahead.
sentences.chinese: 晴空丽日，前面是婀娜多姿的树木和高楼大厦。

sentences.english: Autumn disrobes the trees of leaves.
Buzzing insects will infest all your trees and the crops of your soil.
sentences.chinese: 害虫要吃尽你所有的树木和土地的出产。

sentences.english: I am just the owner of a small property, getting rid of my unwanted trees.
sentences.chinese: 我只是小业主，摆脱我不需要的树木。

sentences.english: Allen would never climb a tall tree.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦从不爬上高的树木。

sentences.english: The fallen tree has bridged the two porches.
sentences.chinese: 那棵倒下的树木把两个门廊连接起来了。

sentences.english: New records often go into new stands.
sentences.chinese: 新记录通常进入新树木中。

sentences.english: On the other side of the brook, there are many trees. There are lots of green bamboo groves.
sentences.chinese: 在小河的一边有许多树木，还有一片翠绿的竹林。

sentences.english: Trees are slashed down by the PLASMA CUTTERS.
sentences.chinese: 树木被切割机摧枯拉朽般砍倒。
不能吹倒神所栽的树木。

sentences.english: At a certain point, though, you won't need to prune the tree.
sentences.chinese: 在某个特定的点，然而，你不在需要修剪树木。

sentences.english: And what the land is， whether it be fat or lean， whether there be wood therein， or not.
sentences.chinese: 又看那地土是肥美是瘠薄，其中有树木没有。

sentences.english: The trees are born round so that they can protect themselves.
sentences.chinese: 所以，树木是因为要保护自己才会长成圆的。

sentences.english: Scientists have noted that elephants tend to avoid trees with beehives.
sentences.chinese: 科学家们指出大象往往避开有蜂房的树木。

definition: Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
